languages.text: {n}Найдж держит оружие словно оно его сейчас ужалит. На его лбу выступает пот.{/n} "Чтоб меня машинной искрой тряхнуло! Самодельное оружие, да еще и собранное прямо в этом отсеке — маркировка на деталях совпадает с запчастями для местных машин. Дело очень серьезное — кажется, кто-то замышляет бунт и тайно собирает себе арсенал из подручных материалов прямо у нас под носом!"

{n}Nije holds the weapon as if it is going to bite him, sweat beading on his forehead.{/n} "Machine spark shake me! A homemade weapon, and assembled right in this compartment — the markings are the same as those on local machine parts. This is a very serious matter — it seems someone is plotting a riot and secretly building their own arsenal from scavenged materials right under our noses!"
languages.original_text: {n}Найдж держит оружие словно оно его сейчас ужалит. На его лбу выступает пот.{/n} "Чтоб меня машинной искрой тряхнуло! languages.text: {n}Nije sostiene el arma como si le fuese a morder, con la frente perlada de sudor.{/n} «¡Que me fundan! Un arma improvisada, y ensamblada ni más ni menos que en este mismo compartimento; tiene las mismas marcas que nuestras máquinas. ¡Esto es un asunto muy grave; parece que alguien planea un motín y está haciendo acopio de un arsenal clandestino con piezas rapiñadas!».
languages.original_text: {n}Nije holds the weapon as if it is going to bite him, sweat beading on his forehead.{/n} "Machine spark shake me! A homemade weapon, and assembled right in this compartment — the markings are the same as those on local machine parts. This is a very serious matter — it seems someone is plotting a riot and secretly building their own arsenal from scavenged materials right under our noses!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nije sostiene el arma como si le fuese a morder, con la frente perlada de sudor.{/n} «¡Que me fundan! Un arma improvisada, y ensamblada ni más ni menos que en este mismo compartimento; tiene las mismas marcas que nuestras máquinas. ¡Esto es un asunto muy grave; parece que alguien planea un motín y está haciendo acopio de un arsenal clandestino con piezas rapiñadas!».

languages.text: {n}ニジェは額に汗をにじませながら、噛みつきそうな勢いで武器を構えた。{/n}「機械の火花が私を震わせるんだ！自家製兵器が、この区画で組み立てられた…このマークは、現地の機械部品のマークと同じで、これは非常に深刻な問題である。どうやら誰かが暴動を企て、私たちの目と鼻の先で密かに廃品から兵器を作っているようだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Nije holds the weapon as if it is going to bite him, sweat beading on his forehead.{/n} "Machine spark shake me! A homemade weapon, and assembled right in this compartment — the markings are the same as those on local machine parts. This is a very serious matter — it seems someone is plotting a riot and secretly building their own arsenal from scavenged materials right under our noses!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ニジェは額に汗をにじませながら、噛みつきそうな勢いで武器を構えた。{/n}「機械の火花が私を震わせるんだ！自家製兵器が、この区画で組み立てられた…このマークは、現地の機械部品のマークと同じで、これは非常に深刻な問題である。どうやら誰かが暴動を企て、私たちの目と鼻の先で密かに廃品から兵器を作っているようだ！」

languages.text: {n}尼杰拿着武器，额头上冒出了汗珠，就好像手里的武器要咬他一样。{/n}“让那些机器电死我算了！这把武器就是在这片甲板上组装起来的，上面的标记和这边机器上的零件一模一样。这件事情非常严重，看起来像是有人打算发动暴乱。他们就藏在我们眼皮底下，偷偷摸摸收集各种各样的材料，制造他们自己的军械！”
languages.original_text: {n}Nije holds the weapon as if it is going to bite him, sweat beading on his forehead.{/n} "Machine spark shake me! A homemade weapon, and assembled right in this compartment — the markings are the same as those on local machine parts. This is a very serious matter — it seems someone is plotting a riot and secretly building their own arsenal from scavenged materials right under our noses!"

traits.locale_text: {n}尼杰拿着武器，额头上冒出了汗珠，就好像手里的武器要咬他一样。{/n}“让那些机器电死我算了！这把武器就是在这片甲板上组装起来的，上面的标记和这边机器上的零件一模一样。这件事情非常严重，看起来像是有人打算发动暴乱。他们就藏在我们眼皮底下，偷偷摸摸收集各种各样的材料，制造他们自己的军械！”

languages.text: {n}Nije hält die Waffe, als würde sie ihn beißen. Auf seiner Stirn bildet sich Schweiß.{/n} "Beim Funken der Maschine! Eine handgemachte Waffe, in diesem Modul montiert ... mit den Markierungen der lokalen Maschinenteile. Das ist eine ernste Angelegenheit ... offenbar plant jemand einen Aufstand und baut heimlich ein eigenes Arsenal aus geplünderten Materialien auf ... vor unserer Nase!"
languages.original_text: {n}Nije holds the weapon as if it is going to bite him, sweat beading on his forehead.{/n} "Machine spark shake me! A homemade weapon, and assembled right in this compartment — the markings are the same as those on local machine parts. This is a very serious matter — it seems someone is plotting a riot and secretly building their own arsenal from scavenged materials right under our noses!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nije hält die Waffe, als würde sie ihn beißen. Auf seiner Stirn bildet sich Schweiß.{/n} "Beim Funken der Maschine! Eine handgemachte Waffe, in diesem Modul montiert ... mit den Markierungen der lokalen Maschinenteile. Das ist eine ernste Angelegenheit ... offenbar plant jemand einen Aufstand und baut heimlich ein eigenes Arsenal aus geplünderten Materialien auf ... vor unserer Nase!"

languages.text: {n}Le front dégoulinant de sueur, Nije tient l'arme à bout de bras, comme si elle allait subitement le mordre.{/n} « Que la machine me foudroie ! Une arme improvisée… Et si l'on en croit les marques, identiques à celles des pièces de la machine du coin, elle a été assemblée au sein même de ce compartiment. C'est gravissime. On dirait bien que quelqu'un se constitue un véritable arsenal à base de matériaux de récupération, et tout ça sous notre nez ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Nije holds the weapon as if it is going to bite him, sweat beading on his forehead.{/n} "Machine spark shake me! A homemade weapon, and assembled right in this compartment — the markings are the same as those on local machine parts. This is a very serious matter — it seems someone is plotting a riot and secretly building their own arsenal from scavenged materials right under our noses!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le front dégoulinant de sueur, Nije tient l'arme à bout de bras, comme si elle allait subitement le mordre.{/n} « Que la machine me foudroie ! Une arme improvisée… Et si l'on en croit les marques, identiques à celles des pièces de la machine du coin, elle a été assemblée au sein même de ce compartiment. C'est gravissime. On dirait bien que quelqu'un se constitue un véritable arsenal à base de matériaux de récupération, et tout ça sous notre nez ! »

languages.text: {n}Nije, silahı âdeta kendisini ısıracakmış gibi tutuyor. Alnında ter damlaları oluşuyor.{/n} "Makine kıvılcımları titretsin beni! Bu silah el yapımı, hem de bu kompartımandan çıkmış. Bölgedeki makine parçalarıyla aynı işaretleri taşıyor. Bu husus çok önemli bir hâl aldı. Galiba birileri, ayaklanma planları yapıp hurda materyallerden gizlice kendi cephaneliğini kuruyor. Hem de burnumuzun dibinde!"
languages.original_text: {n}Nije holds the weapon as if it is going to bite him, sweat beading on his forehead.{/n} "Machine spark shake me! A homemade weapon, and assembled right in this compartment — the markings are the same as those on local machine parts. This is a very serious matter — it seems someone is plotting a riot and secretly building their own arsenal from scavenged materials right under our noses!"
